title: PC_New World Order - CTC (gold.edition.updated)-.direct.play.-To
description:

  provides you with

...:: New World Order - Gold Edition -.direct.play.- ::...

<->( ripped.: nothing )<-x->( added.: updated v1.5 )<->
             


<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

New World Order - Counter Terrorism Combat is a FPS Game.

The story takes place in the very near future.Gamers play a rookie 
member of the Global Assault Team, a commando squad created 
by international powers to take on a dangerous group of freelance 
terrorist factions better known as The Syndicate.

Made from of a collective of real bad guys - former Spetznaz, 
ex-KGB, corrupt CIA, deserted special forces and all kinds of 
mercenaries, "The Syndicate," make and break their own rules. 

They take hostages, sabotage and destroy vital installations to get 
the results they want and earn big bucks. The GAT has the mandate 
to operate on a global level, prevent terrorist actions and dispose of 
The Syndicate any way they see fit.


<->( more )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

screenshots >>> http://tothegame.com/screenshot.asp?id=218


<->( minimum of system requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Pentium 1000 Mhz processor, AMD Athlon 1000 Mhz or equivalent 
Microsoft Windows 2000 or XP ( Vista un-checked! )
256 Mb internal memory 
64 Mb memory AGP 3D video card 
750 Mb free space on hard drive 
DirectX compliant sound card 
DirectX version 9.0b. or later 
Latest available drivers for video and sound card 



<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with WinRar ( newest! ) ... or use 7zip.

2.: double click: nwo-ctc.exe ( must be done! )

3.: double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and run game with!. 

<->( general hints )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

read everything carefuly, especially the following below ...

<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->



<->( Special Info )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed .exe file , in this

case its the file > nwo-ctc.exe < as a lame virus, because its  the 

byte by byte check error of some virustools!. ( h e u r i s t i c s  ) but... 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective heuristics,

you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusTools-WebSite!.

(heuristics). you can also upload the file to certain websites to let them test.

with this result...> a false positive alert from... >>>  thank you for reading!.
